Commands.Maser Whip: Melee BRV attack  Target: 2 turns Turn Rate Down
Commands.BRV Attack+: Melee BRV attack.  High turn rate.
Commands.Degenerator Whip: Melee BRV attack + HP attack  Target: Delay 1 turn
Commands.Homing Whip: 7-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt on targets afflicted with Action Delay Up or Speed Down.  BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 150% of Max BRV.  Inflicts Medium Speed Down for 4 turns.  Grants Instructor's Whip for 6 turns.  Triggers an HP attack if BRV is over 100% Max BRV.  Instructor's Whip raises Max BRV and Attack.

Passives.Maser Whip Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Maser Whip.
Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Degenerator Whip Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Degenerator Whip.
Passives.BRV Danger Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is below Initial BRV.
Passives.Maser Whip Charge: Increases the max uses of Maser Whip by 1.
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Degenerator Whip Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Degenerator Whip.
Passives.The Instructor's Education: Slightly raises Max BRV of all allies for 2 turns after inflicting a debuff.

Weapons.Chain Whip CP: 15: Increases the potency of Maser Whip and lowers its Action Delay.Grants Small Attack Up for 6 turns.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 6 turns.
Weapons.Red Scorpion CP: 35: Increases the potency of Degenerator Whip and allows it to delay target by 3 turns instead of 1.Increases its max uses by 1.Grants Small Speed Down for 3 turns.
